short_summary: Structural remediation of the Kwisitis Visitor Centre, construction in a heritage designated center
full_summary:
### **title**: Stage 2 - Kwisitis VC Structure & Window Restoration - Pacific Rim National Park Reserve

### **Contract Information**

| Language | Field Value |
| --- | --- |
| English | Solicitation Number: 5P468-23-0042/A -001 |
| French | Numéro d'appel d'offres: 5P468-23-0042/A -001 |
| English | Closing Date: 2023-06-27T16:00:00 |
| French | Date de cloture: 2023-06-27T16:00:00 |
| English | Contract Start Date: 2023-06-29 |
| French | Date de début du contrat: 2023-06-29 |
| English | Contract End Date: 2023-11-16 |
| French | Date de fin du contrat: 2023-11-16 |

### **Project Information**

The Pacific Rim National Park Reserve has issued a Request for Proposal to undertake Stage 2 of a two-stage solicitation process for the structural remediation of the historic Kwisitis Visitor Centre. The project includes structural repairs, window replacement, and electrical and mechanical upgrades.

Construction will take place in a heritage designated visitor center that may be open to the public during construction.

The project requires qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

### **Contract Details**

* Type of Contract: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Unspsc Code: 72121100 (Commercial and office building construction services)
* Region of Opportunity: Canada
* Region of Delivery: British Columbia and Canada
* Trade Agreements: The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Contracting Entity: Parks Canada

### **Contact Information**

* Name: Jen Maheu
* Email: jennifer.maheu@pc.gc.ca
* Phone: (587) 432-8458

### **Note**

This contract notice has expired. We recommend that suppliers do not submit any bids. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
